title: Herbs de Provence - Stucky Chiropractic
description: Ingredients: 1/2 cup Thyme Leaf 1/4 cup Marjoram Leaf 2 tablespoons of cut and sifted Rosemary Leaf 2 tablespoons Savory... Read more
cleaned_text: - 1/4 cup Marjoram Leaf - 2 tablespoons of cut and sifted Rosemary Leaf - 2 tablespoons Savory - 1 teaspoon of Lavender Flowers (lightly ground-optional) - 2 teaspoons dried orange zest (optional) - 1 teaspoon ground Fennel To Make: If you are zesting the orange yourself, remove the zest of one organic orange and dry in an oven on lowest setting or a dehydrator until completely dry. Place in a food processor with the lavender flowers and lightly pulse. Remove and mix all ingredients in a jar or bowl until mixed (do not grind up the herbs!). Excellent to add in soups, on chicken or on roasted vegetables.
